Uses of Interface
vista.graph.GELayoutManager

Packages that use GELayoutManager
vista.graph   
 

Uses of GELayoutManager in vista.graph
 

Classes in vista.graph that implement GELayoutManager
 class GEBorderLayout
          Lays out the elements in North, South , East , West and Center positions.
 class GEGridLayout
           
 class GELineLayout
          Lays out Bounded(s) in a linear fashion.
 class GEMultiBorderLayout
          Lays out the elements in North, South , East , West and Center positions.
 class GEOverlayLayout
          Lays out Bounded(s) on top of each other.
 class GEScaledLayout
          This interface provides methods for managing the layouts of BoundedComposite objects which contain other Bounded objects ( which may themselves be Composites).
 class GETickLayout
          Lays out Bounded(s) such that their bounds are centered on the ticks as specified in the given TickData.
 

Methods in vista.graph that return GELayoutManager

          gets current layout manager
 GELayoutManager GEContainer.getLayout()
